Insane Clown President: Dispatches from the 2016 Circus bụ akwụkwọ na-abụghị akụkọ ifo nke Matt Taibbi dere banyere Donald Trump na ntuli aka onye isi ala United States n'afọ 2016
Akwụkwọ ahụ nwere ihe osise nke onye na-ese ihe na Rolling Stone bụ Victor Juhasz
Nhọrọ Taibbi maka aha akwụkwọ ahụ sitere n'ụdị ahịa Trump ma bụrụ okwu dabere na aha egwu egwu America bụ Insane Clown Posse
Ọrụ ya sitere n'ike mmụọ nsọ Hunter S
Thompson, onye bipụtara Fear and Loathing on the Campaign Trail '72.
Taibbi malitere ọrụ ahụ site n'ihota n'akwụkwọ 2008 ya, The Great Derangement, na-ekwusi ike na ọ buru amụma banyere mwakpo nke akụkọ adịgboroja na mmalite nke oke aka nri na ọha mmadụ
Ọ na-arụ ụka na ihe ndị dị otú ahụ nke ọha mmadụ nyere aka ịtọ ụda maka ihu igwe nke Trump nwere ike ịrịgo n'ọchịchị
Taibbi dere na ahụmahụ Trump gara aga na telivishọn nyere ya ngwaọrụ iji merie n'oge ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị post-eziokwu
Ọ na-akatọ ndị mgbasa ozi maka mkpuchi ha banyere Trump, na'ịkọwa etu okwu mkpọsa nke onye na - emelitere mgbasawanye
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-edekọ usoro iheomume nke echiche onye edemede ka oge na oge ka ọ na'ịmalite ịghọta ohere Trump nwere ịga nke ọma
Taibbi tụgharịrị uche n'ihe ndị mere mgbe ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị, na-ekwu na Trump meriri n"ihi na o nwere ike iji ike telivishọn mee ihe.
Akwụkwọ ahụ bụ ihe ịga nke ọma nke azụmahịa, na-arụ ọrụ na akụkọ ifo siri ike na nọmba 15 na The New York Times Best Seller list
The New York Times depụtakwara ya dị ka akwụkwọ kacha ere ahịa na ụdị ya nke jikọtara akwụkwọ na akwụkwọ eletrik
Ọ malitere na ọnụọgụ isii na ndepụta ndị kacha ere ahịa nke Los Angeles Times, na-anọgide na Ndepụta ahụ ọnwa abụọ
Ọ bụkwa akwụkwọ kacha ere ahịa na New Zealand.
Onye isi oche Insane Clown bụ onye Publishers Weekly nyochara nke ọma, nke kpọrọ ya "akụkụ hà nhata na-atọ ụtọ ma na'enwu gbaa"

Kirkus Reviews gosipụtara enweghị ihe na-eme ka onye edemede ahụ bụrụ onye ziri ezi, wee mechie, "[a] setịpụ ozi na'ụzọ na na - nke na "otú ọbụna onye na San Francisco Chronicle kpọrọ ya "ihe onwunwe bara ọgaranya nke edemede edere nke ọma site na mkpọsa ahụ"
The New York Times katọrọ ọrụ ahụ maka enweghị ọganihu
The Daily Beast kọwara ya dị ka "ihe na-eme ka mmadụ na ya na nkwonkwo, ihe na na'ikpere"
Adelaide Review kwuru na onye edemede ahụ bụ "otu n'ime ndị na-akọwapụta akụkọ kachasị mma"
Pittsburgh Post-Gazette katọrọ akwụkwọ ahụ maka ịghara ịbanye n'ụzọ miri emi na ntinye aka Russia na ntuli aka 2016 United States
Santa Barbara Independent kwubiri, "Insane Clown President bụ ọrụ bara uru banyere otu n'ime ntuli aka kachasị njọ na akụkọ ntolite America.".

Onye isi oche Insane Clown nwere isiokwu abụọ mbụ na mgbakwunye na nchịkọta nke akụkọ 25 sitere na Rolling Stone site na Matt Taibbi n'okporo ụzọ mkpọsa ntuli aka onye isi ala nke United States na 2016
Taibbi na-akọwa ihe omume nke mkpọsa ntuli aka 2016 dị ka, "n'otu oge ihe kachasị akpali akparamagwa na ihe na'asọ oyi nke ọgbọ anyị"

N'okwu mmeghe nke ọrụ ahụ, Taibbi hotara ihe sitere n'akwụkwọ ya nke afọ 2008 The Great Derangement, ma dekọọ otú o si hụ mmetụta na-arịwanye elu nke ihe ndị na'etiti ọha mmadụ dị ka alt-right na akụkọ ụgha afọ iri tupu mbipụta akwụkwọ ahụ

Ọ na-ekwusi ike na ihe ndị dị otú ahụ dugara na ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ebe Trump nwere ike itolite. Taibbi malitere ọrụ ahụ site n'ihota n'akwụkwọ 2008 ya, The Great Derangement, na-ekwusi ike na ọ buru amụma banyere mwakpo nke akụkọ adịgboroja na mmalite nke oke aka nri na ọha mmadụ

Ọ na-arụ ụka na ihe ndị dị otú ahụ nke ọha mmadụ nyere aka ịtọ ụda maka ihu igwe nke Trump nwere ike ịrịgo n'ọchịchị. Taibbi na-adọ aka ná ntị, "okwu mkparị na enweghị ịma onwe onye nke Donald Trump na'ụzọ dị mwute na ọ bụ ihe mgbochi zuru oke maka igosipụta ire ure na ileghara usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị rụrụ arụ anya"
Ọ na-akwa arịrị, "Ụdị na ya na'enweghị ike ịkwụsị nke a ga-abụrịrị na ọ na - na
Publishers Weekly nyochara na nyocha akwụkwọ ya, "Taibbi, onye edemede nwere ọgụgụ isi na echiche siri ike, dị ka ihe ọchị dịka ọ na-emebi ihe"

Nnyocha ahụ kwuru na onye dere akwụkwọ ahụ achọghị ihe ziri ezi n'ọrụ ya, "Akwụkwọ ahụ bụ nke na-emegide onwe ya n"ụzọ dị ịrịba ama, ndị na'akụkụ aka ekpe nke etiti nwere ike ịchị ọchị n " Nnyocha ahụ katọrọ ọdịdị na-emegiderịta onwe ya nke Taibbi, dị ka onye otu ndị nta akụkọ n'onwe ya, na'ewe oge n"akwụkwọ ahụ iji katọọ mgbasa ozi. Nnyocha ahụ kwubiri, "Ndị na-agụ akwụkwọ ọhụrụ na Taibbi ga-akwa ụta maka ịghara ịgụ akụkọ ya ka ihe omume na'ihu, ebe nyocha ya bụ akụkụ hà nhata na nke na - na
" Kirkus Reviews dere na n'oge niile Taibbi kọrọ banyere mkpọsa nke afọ 2016, akwụkwọ ahụ, "na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe ọchị nke na-eji nwayọọ nwayọọ ghọọ ihe nkiri egwu"

Kirkus Reviews katọrọ ụda onye edemede na mmalite nke akwụkwọ ahụ, "Taibbi doro anya banyere ndị agha populist na mgbasa ozi gbajiri agbaji Trump ririgbu, mana nyere ya nnabata nke ileda ohere Trump anya, n'apata mmeri ya nke isi nke mbụ, nke na-akọwa otu isi site na ya

Akwụkwọ 2008, The Great Derangement, iji gosi ole e buru amụma ya n'ụzọ ziri ezi, na-eche nchebe ma ọ bụrụ na ọ bụghị ihe na-adịghị mma.. Akụkụ sitere na Kirkus Reviews kwubiri, "A na-eme ka ọ dị egwu nke na'egosi otú ọbụna onye na - obi abụọ kachasị njọ na klas pundit nwere ike isi kpọọ ìsì".

Onye edemede Los Angeles Review of Books Greg LaGambina kwuru banyere nkwenye akwụkwọ ahụ banyere mmeri Trump na ngwụcha ntuli aka ahụ, "Insane Clown President: Dispatches from the 2016 Circus, gaara abụ mkpọtụ dị mma nke agụ ma ọ bụrụ na njedebe ahụ emebighị njem ahụ"

LaGambina kwubiri, "Insane Clown President nwere ike ọ gaghị abụ akwụkwọ o bu n'obi ide, mana maka onye ọ bụla na-achọ ịpụ n"ọgba aghara anyị ji anya banye, ozi Taibbi nwere anya bụrụ ezigbo map". Onye na-enyocha akwụkwọ San Francisco Chronicle bụ John Diaz kwuru na ọrụ ahụ nwere, "ọtụtụ edemede edere nke ọma site na mkpọsa ahụ"
Diaz dere na Onye isi ala Insane Clown, "na-eme ka a mara ọdịdị dị iche iche nke ịgba égbè, nke na-enweghị obi ụtọ nke Hunter S

Thompson wetara n'afọ 1972 Nixon-McGovern campaign na ọrụ ya, Fear and Loathing on the Campaign Trail". Diaz kwubiri, "Onye isi oche Clown bụ onye na-agụ ihe na ikuku ma ga-eweta ọchị mara n'etiti ndị nnwere onwe ga'anụ ụtọ ajọ ihe ọ na ya na ndị niile na ụgbọ ala clown nke mejupụtara mpaghara mbụ nke Republican".
Onye nta akụkọ Daily Beast bụ John Batchelor kpọrọ akwụkwọ ahụ "ụda, na-agbaji agbaji, kinkụ"
Akwụkwọ akụkọ New York Times tụlere ọrụ ahụ, yana John Williams na-ahụ, "Matt Taibbi ahụghị imeru ihe n'ókè mgbe ọ na-ekpuchi oge mkpọsa kachasị ọhụrụ maka Rolling Stone
Williams kwuru na ọrụ ahụ emeghị ka ọ bụrụ na ọ nwere echiche ziri ezi, na-ede, "Ọ bụrụgodị na aha ya (ma ọ bụ ịmara ọrụ ya gara aga) emegharịghị gị, Taibbi anaghị achọ ụda na ya
" Onye dere akwụkwọ Bustle bụ Kerri Jarema kwuru, "Matt Taibbi na'akụkọ banyere ụgbọ okporo ígwè nke ọdịda anyanwụ, site na mmalite ya dị egwu ruo na nkwubi okwu ya
" Jarema kọwara ihe odide onye edemede ahụ dị ka "nchọpụta nwụrụ anwụ, nyocha oge".
Onye nta akụkọ Santa Barbara Independent bụ Brian Tanguay dere na nyocha akwụkwọ ya na Taibbi bụ "onye nketa ime mmụọ nke ndị odeakwụkwọ mkpọsa onye isi ala a ma ama" gụnyere Hunter S
Thompson na Timothy Crouse
Tanguay kwuru banyere ụdị edemede Taibbi, "Taibibi bụ onye na-eme ihe ike ma na'oge na ọ na - na O kwuru, "Onye agha nke mkpọsa onye isi ala anọ, Taibbi maara otú egwuregwu ahụ si arụ ọrụ
Ma ọ bụ ma ọ dịkarịa ala ọ maara ruo mgbe Trump bịara
" Nyocha Tanguay kwubiri, "Insane Clown President bụ ọrụ bara uru banyere otu n'ime ntuli aka kachasị njọ na akụkọ ntolite America..
Àtụ:Trump media
